question:
Your local council is considering closing a sports and leisure center that it runs, in order to save money.
Write a letter to local council. In the letter
.give details of how you and your friends use the center
.explain why the sports and leisure center is important for the local community
.describe the possible effects on local people if the center closes.
write 150 words.
text: I am writing this letter to you to request you kindly do not consider closing the sports and leisure centre in our area.

As you are aware it is the only place in our locality, which has an Olympic size swimming pool, it is used by many children to learn swimming. Also, many of use it for training purposes, as me and friends we compete at national level.

Additionally, it is a very significant place for these people, because many of the local festivals are celebrated together by them here. There is a big open ground inside, which is used for open air functions. This ground is also used for cricket and football training sessions to promote the in house talent.

Unfortunately, if the centre closes, there will a major loss to the society. As the swimming pool and ground will not be there, many children who wish to succeed in the field of sports will suffer. In addition, there won't be any festival programmes taking place which binds the community together.
We hope you will consider our points prior to taking any final decision.
